originalText.text:
Rick was great explaining the history of the bridges and New York. We loved the bluetooth helmets which allowed us to hear and talk to the group. He was very conscientious since this was our first time on e-bikes and he made it easy to understand. We picked it up after a few blocks and had a great time afterwards. He was prepared for the whether and it began to downpour towards the end of our ride up the bike expressway back to his store. He was prepared with ponchos. We can't wait to go back to New York and take his Central Park ride. He's awesome and recommend it to everyone.

Thanks again Rick and see you soon

originalText.text: The best thing we experienced in NYC!!! Honestly Rick was so amazing and knowledgeable, we will never forget this bike tour. We felt safe at all times on the road and the radio helmets are a fantastic touch. Cannot recommend this enough, if I could give 6 stars I would!!! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

text.text: The best thing we experienced in NYC!!! Honestly Rick was so amazing and knowledgeable, we will never forget this bike tour. We felt safe at all times on the road and the radio helmets are a fantastic touch. Cannot recommend this enough, if I could give 6 stars I would!!! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

originalText.text: We did the 5 bridges tour and it was the best!  It is a great way to see this amazing city.  You really get a feel for the different boroughs and the city itself.  Rick is a goldmine of information, has great recommendations and is so generous with his time and knowledge.  It's exhilarating, exciting and so much fun. Highly highly recommend!

text.text: We did the 5 bridges tour and it was the best!  It is a great way to see this amazing city.  You really get a feel for the different boroughs and the city itself.  Rick is a goldmine of information, has great recommendations and is so generous with his time and knowledge.  It's exhilarating, exciting and so much fun. Highly highly recommend!

originalText.text:
Amazing ride over the 5 bridges.
What a great way to see NY and learn so much from Ricky.
Really good, really safe and great fun.  The blue tooth helmets mean you are in constant contact.
Thank you.

text.text:

What a great way to see NY and learn so much from Ricky.
Really good, really safe and great fun.  The blue tooth helmets mean you are in constant contact.
Thank you.

originalText.text: This is the best tour I have ever been a part of. The best part is these tours are private to 'your' friends or family. You will love Rick. He is a great guy and a life long New Yorker who will show and tell you about everything you want to know about NYC. You will never be able to see NYC like you will on this tour. These e-bikes give you views you wont get in a car or a tour bus. The traffic alone will take you days to cover what we did in 3 to 4 hours. The e-bikes allow you to get to the coolest and most scenic parts of NYC. I have done several e-bike tours and I own an e-bike but I learned so much from Rick. Next time I am back in NYC I will be back for one of the other tours offered. But I highly recommend the 5 bridge tour.
